testcase.classname: validate Login Functionality for swag labs Application
testcase.name: Check the login functionality for valid data
testcase.system-out: Given user is on the login page of Swag Lab.................................passed When User enter uname & password............................................passed And User clicks on login button.............................................passed Then Login should be successful.............................................passed

testcase.classname: validate Login Functionality for swag labs Application
testcase.name: Check the login functionality for invalid data
testcase.system-out: Given user is on the login page of Swag Lab.................................passed When User enter invalid uname & password....................................passed And User clicks on login button.............................................passed Then Error message should display...........................................passed
